--- a/src/app/foo.ts
++ b/src/app/foo.ts
@@ -1,3 +1,4 @@
 export function foo() {
-  return 1;
+  const x = 1;
+  return x;
 }
diff --git a/src/app/bar.ts b/src/app/bar.ts
--- a/src/app/bar.ts
++ b/src/app/bar.ts
@@ -0,0 +1,3 @@
+export function bar() {
+  return 42;
+}
